item.description:
Networking Extravaganza!

Come meet other investors and service providers and build your power team!

Bring your potential deals . . . an expert panel will ask you questions and help you decide if it's a DEAL OR NO DEAL!

Bring lots of business cards . . . we'll bring the pizza!

NHREIA March Monthly Meeting

When: 6:30 pm, Wednesday August 11, 2010

Where: Best Western Executive Court, 13500 South Willow Street, Manchester

Cost: Free for NHREIA members; only $20 for visitors and meetup members
item.name: The New Hampshire Real Estate Investors Association Monthly Meetup
